title: CLRI Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Project Associate I Posts
description: The Central Leather Research Institute (CLRI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Associate I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.Sc. can apply for the CLRI Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection proces...
